general.name: eSDSS_DA_df
general.short: Measurements of physical parameters for DA white dwarfs observed in SDSS Data Releases 1 through 16.
general.description: Measurements of radial velocities, spectroscopic effective temperatures and surface gravities, and photometric effective temperatures and radii for 19,257 unique DA white dwarfs observed in SDSS Data Releases 1 through 16.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

hdu1.description: Measurements of radial velocities, spectroscopic effective temperatures and surface gravities, and photometric effective temperatures and radii for 19,257 unique DA white dwarfs observed in SDSS Data Releases 1 through 16.

spec_avail.name: spec_avail
spec_avail.description: Flag indicating where the spectrum can be accessed: 0=https://dr18.sdss.org/sas/dr18/spectro/sdss/redux/26/spectra/lite/, 1=https://dr18.sdss.org/sas/dr18/spectro/sdss/redux/103/spectra/lite/, 2=https://dr18.sdss.org/sas/dr18/spectro/sdss/redux/104/spectra/lite/, 3=https://dr18.sdss.org/sas/dr18/spectro/sdss/redux/v5_13_2/spectra/lite, 4=https://dr18.sdss.org/sas/dr18/spectro/sdss/redux/v6_0_4/spectra/lite/, 5=https://dr18.sdss.org/sas/dr18/spectro/sdss/redux/eFEDS/spectra/lite/, 6=https://dr18.sdss.org/sas/dr18/spectro/boss/redux/eFEDS/spectra/lite/, 7=https://dr18.sdss.org/sas/dr18/spectro/boss/redux/v6_0_4/spectra/lite/, 8= available through SDSS.astroquery

r_med_geo.description: Median geometric distance from Bailer-Jones et al. (2021)

r_hi_geo.name: r_hi_geo
r_hi_geo.description: 84th percentile of geometric distance from Bailer-Jones et al. (2021)

pmdec_error.description: Error on proper motion in dec

e_phot_radius_gaia_hi.name: e_phot_radius_gaia_hi

sdss_logg_flag_lo.name: sdss_logg_flag_lo
sdss_logg_flag_lo.description: Flag indicating whether the photometric fit 0=failed, 1=was successful with variable logg, 2=was successful with fixed logg=8

gaia_logg_flag_lo.name: gaia_logg_flag_lo
gaia_logg_flag_lo.description: Flag indicating whether the photometric fit 0=failed, 1=was successful with variable logg, 2=was successful with fixed logg=8

sdss_logg_flag_med.description: Flag indicating whether the photometric fit 0=failed, 1=was successful with variable logg, 2=was successful with fixed logg=8

gaia_logg_flag_med.name: gaia_logg_flag_med
gaia_logg_flag_med.description: Flag indicating whether the photometric fit 0=failed, 1=was successful with variable logg, 2=was successful with fixed logg=8

gaia_logg_flag_hi.name: gaia_logg_flag_hi
gaia_logg_flag_hi.description: Flag indicating whether the photometric fit 0=failed, 1=was successful with variable logg, 2=was successful with fixed logg=8

radius_phot_sdss.name: radius_phot_sdss
radius_phot_sdss.description: Final SDSS photometric radius measurement, taken to be the value at the median geometric distance

e_radius_phot_sdss.name: e_radius_phot_sdss
e_radius_phot_sdss.description: Error (measured+distance uncertainty) on the final SDSS photometric radius

radius_phot_gaia.name: radius_phot_gaia
radius_phot_gaia.description: Final Gaia photometric radius measurement, taken to be the value at the median geometric distance

e_radius_phot_gaia.name: e_radius_phot_gaia
e_radius_phot_gaia.description: Error (measured+distance uncertainty) on the final Gaia photometric radius

teff_phot_sdss.name: teff_phot_sdss
teff_phot_sdss.description: Final SDSS photometric effective temperature measurement, taken to be the value at the median geometric distance

e_teff_phot_sdss.name: e_teff_phot_sdss
e_teff_phot_sdss.description: Error (measured+distance uncertainty) on the final SDSS photometric effective temperature

teff_phot_gaia.name: teff_phot_gaia
teff_phot_gaia.description: Final Gaia photometric effective temperature measurement, taken to be the value at the median geometric distance

e_teff_phot_gaia.name: e_teff_phot_gaia
e_teff_phot_gaia.description: Error (measured+distance uncertainty) on the final Gaia photometric effective temperature

phot_err_sdss.name: phot_err_sdss
phot_err_sdss.description: Mean SDSS u, r, and z-band magnitude error

phot_err_gaia.name: phot_err_gaia
phot_err_gaia.description: Mean Gaia BP and RP flux error

radius_phot.name: radius_phot
radius_phot.description: Final photometric radius measurement, prioritizing SDSS photometry, taken to be the value at the median geometric distance

e_radius_phot.name: e_radius_phot
e_radius_phot.description: Error (measured+distance uncertainty) on the final photometric radius

teff_phot.name: teff_phot
teff_phot.description: Final photometric effective temperature measurement, prioritizing SDSS photometry, taken to be the value at the median geometric distance

e_teff_phot.name: e_teff_phot
e_teff_phot.description: Error (measured+distance uncertainty) on the final photometric effective temperature

e_radius_phot_full.name: e_radius_phot_full
e_radius_phot_full.description: Full error (measured+distance uncertainty+systematic) on the final radius

e_teff_phot_full.name: e_teff_phot_full
e_teff_phot_full.description: Full error (measured+distance uncertainty+systematic) on the final effective temperature

mass_rad_logg.name: mass_rad_logg
mass_rad_logg.description: Mass measured from coadded spectrum surface gravity and final photometric radius

e_mass_rad_logg.name: e_mass_rad_logg
e_mass_rad_logg.description: Error on mass from surface gravity and radius

mass_logg_theory.name: mass_logg_theory
mass_logg_theory.description: Mass measured from coadded spectrum surface gravity and effective temperature, combined with La Plata models

e_mass_logg_theory.name: e_mass_logg_theory
e_mass_logg_theory.description: Error on mass measured from surface gravity and theory

mass_rad_theory.name: mass_rad_theory
mass_rad_theory.description: Mass measured from final photometric radius and effective temperature, combined with La Plata models

e_mass_rad_theory.name: e_mass_rad_theory
e_mass_rad_theory.description: Error on mass measured from radius and theory

rv_corv_lsr.name: rv_corv_lsr
rv_corv_lsr.description: Measured coadded spectrum radial velocity, corrected to the LSR

rv_corv_asym_corr.name: rv_corv_asym_corr
rv_corv_asym_corr.description: Measured coadded spectrum radial velocity, corrected to the LSR and for asymmetric drift, only for WDs used in the Crumpler et. al temperature dependence detection

asym_corr.name: asym_corr
asym_corr.description: Applied asymmetric drift correction, only for WDs used in the Crumpler et. al temperature dependence detection

tempdep_catalog_flag.name: tempdep_catalog_flag
tempdep_catalog_flag.description: Flag indicating whether WD was used in the Crumpler et. al temperature dependence detection
